summary: Motorist Martin Delambre attempts to keep evidence of his family's bizarre experiments in teleportation hidden from his wife, who is hiding secrets of her own.
cast: Brian Donlevy|George Baker|Carole Gray|Yvette Rees|Burt Kwouk|Michael Graham|Jeremy Wilkin|Charles Carson|Mary Manson|Rachel Kempson|Warren Stanhope|Mia Anderson|Arnold Bell|Stan Simmons
